pages.title: ⍟ Nine of Pentacles ⍟
pages.text: Spirit of Material Gain$(br)      ♀ Venus in ♍ Virgo

A lofty woman, stands amid a great abundance of grapevines in the beautiful garden of a manorial house. It is a wide field, suggesting plenty in all things.$(br)  She wears a flowing robe, a sign of her wealth and social status.$(br)  The vines behind her are heavy with grapes and golden coins, representing the fruitful accomplishment of all her desires.$(br)  Her right hand rests upon one of the nine coins, and her

fingers wrap around the purple grapes on the vine, illustrating her careful relationship with riches.$(br)  A colorful bird rests calmly on her left hand, signifying the woman’s intellectual and spiritual mastery; even if in complacent aloofness to the world beyond her garden.$(br)  This is a card of sudden fortunes, gains and loss; but also of comfort, abundance, and the melancholy that follows.$(br)  Whether spent carelessly or given generously, riches spent

without judgment or control manifest our desire to give up our material possessions. $(br2)$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  Independence, prudence, luxury and discernment.$(br)  Riches spent freely, possibly foolishly. Being unattached to possessions.$(br2)$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Concern for the future, a need to reconsider plans.$(br)  Dependence, destitution, holding on to riches.
